section.name: About
section.p: JSR-303 Validators to validate a daterange and other constraints.

section.name: Constraints
section.p:
Following constraints are available for now:
AllowedIntegers Validate an integer value against a list of integers AllowedStrings Validate a string against a list of strings DateRange Validate the interval of a begin and end date Nested Validates a class constraint or a collection of it Future Check if a date is in the future or if required today or in the future

section.name: Dependencies
section.p: The only dependency is joda-time 1.2.1. This version is used to be compatible with the version delivered by Oracle in their Weblogic 10.3.x.

section.name: New Features
section.p: If you need more features or see any bugs please report them at the github page https://github.com/Waxolunist/validationconstraints/issues.
